metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2568 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: pkexec, when used with --user nonpriv, allows local users to escape to the parent session via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call, which pushes characters to the terminal's input buffer.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no fix available as of 2021-05-26 rodrigo-zaiden> no fix available as of 2022-02-21. leosilva> no fix available as of 2023-07-21.

criterions.comment: policykit-1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
